query.q: O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`pod_ip`) AS `Pod IP`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`, `pod_name`

O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`node_name`) AS `Node IP`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`, `pod_name`
eval(A/1000, alias='CPU使用', A="series_sum(\"M::`kube_pod`:(last(`memory_usage_bytes`) AS `CPU使用`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' } BY `pod_name`\")")

eval(A/B, A="series_sum(\"O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`mem_limit`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `pod_name`\")", B="series_sum(\"O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`mem_capacity`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `pod_name`\")")
